NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that a Special General Meeting (SGM) of Global Investments Limited (the Company) will be held at Holiday Inn Singapore Orchard City Centre, Crystal Suite, Level 2, 11 Cavenagh Road, Singapore 229616 on 25 April 2018 at 10.30 am. (or as soon as practicable immediately following the conclusion or adjournment ofthe 2018 Annual General Meeting ofthe Company to be convened on the same day and at the same venue) for the purpose of considering and, if thought fit, passing with or without amendments, the following Resolution 1 as an Ordinary Resolution:

pursuant to the Company’s Memorandum of Association and Bye-Iaws , the exercise by the directors of the Company (Directors) of all the powers of the Company to purchase or otherwise acquire issued and fully paid»up ordinary shares of par value S$0.01 each in the capital ofthe Company (Shares) not exceeding in aggregate the Maximum Limit (as hereafter defined), at such price or prices as may be determined by the Directors from time to time up to the Maximum Price (as hereafter defined), whether by way of:
